QuestData.Title: Vote of Confidence
QuestData.Description:
I will endeavor to protect my son until the votes are cast.
Coryn Stelleris is a predator even among the nobility. It does not surprise me that he should stoop to such depths to ensure his own success.
Tell Ly'leth that she has my support. Unequivocally.
You may also choose to tell her that Coryn Stelleris will hurt her, if she gives him a chance.
Be careful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Ly'leth at the Waning Crescent.
QuestData.RewardText: I know of Coryn. We will not underestimate his venom, rest assured.$b$bThank you for helping Aurore. She is a dear friend of mine.
